Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class GUICreateGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GUIState
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GUICreateGame
public class GUICreateGame extends GUIState
Generates the GUI for creating a game.
